
# Hello and welcome to Vixens Gamiing network!
We are a community of gamers and develpers trying to make game servers and services for everyone to enjoy, currently we have game servers on 
>Gmod

>Valhiem

>Rust

>7 days to die

>GTAV (Five M)

With more planned in the future.
## We hope you have a fun time playing on our servers!
This is a public github repo for our gmod servers, feel free to submit code, bug fixes, feature requests and more here!

# Why make a github?
We aim for full transparancy on the Vixen gaming network, our goal is to provide our users and community with a fun, open gaming experience where anyone can do their part in making the game a better place for all users

## It is mandatory to use css
Sadly it is required that you need to download css textures in order to play on our servers without any issue, you may download css textures and other required game content here.
https://gmodcontent.com/


### We have a lot of features on our server, some of thease are.
>A working bank system
>Vehicles
>A ingame phone that can call and text
>A varitiy of weapons
>A very large map
>The ability to buy and rent property
>Various jobs, ranging from gun dealers to judges and police.
>An in game salery

And more to come!
# Thank you for your continued support towards the Vixen Gaming network.
## I hope you enjoy your time with The Vixen Network and thank you for checking it out! 
### If you have any questions or suggestions be sure to post them on the github discussion board. or contact us on discord https://discord.gg/xbnmtqz4w7 or email us on ghost@v1xen.com
